channel.title: NPC dialogues
channel.description:
Ok i've been searching, trying to change stuff, but i didn't figure out how to make the NPC talk. I mean like the dialogues like on quests - "Click here to continue" , then you get options to choose from...y'know :) I saw it on some server but the admin didnt wanna help me (makes sense). So who knows how to make dialogues? If you don't wan't to publish it you can just tell me on MSN ;D - jauciuj@hotmail.com .
Also i'm looking for a mate that would like to work hard on an unique server ;) contact me on msn

item.title: NPC dialogues
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

lol
ill help with all ur problems
pm me
how to change dialoges
open up dialogue.cfg or something like that
left click it
click open with then notepad
then look for the phrase u want to change to what u want it to change
and for what the npc says over there head
open up npchandler.java
then look for the phrase u want to rephrase and change it
glad to help
and dont hesistate with asking me noob questions
i got ur back
=p

Read full topic
